name: Super Brains: Draw it
description:
Super physics based mind game that makes you suprised and will require you to make brainstorm
instead of ordinary physics based drawing games and repating levels.

Are you ready to use your brain and find the best way to complete each levels.
Use your imagination and brain.
Dont be afraid to be creative.
You can find your own solution.

Features :
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
* Simple rules
* Simple, fun but challenging sometimes
* Suitable for all ages
* Each level is a different game try now!
